name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: There aren't many bugs out here.

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I like bugs, so I'm going back to VIRIDIAN FOREST.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Who's there? Quit listening in on us!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: Excuse me! This is a private conversation!

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: I've never seen you around! Are you good?

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: Are my POKEMON weak? Or, am I just bad?

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I want to get stronger! What's your secret?

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: Huh? You want to talk to me?

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I should carry more POKEMON with me for safety.
